item.title: Cardano, Ethereum Outperform Bitcoin Ahead Of FOMC Meeting As Altcoins Surge
item.description: Altcoins rise ahead of FOMC announcement as Bitcoin holds $92,000 after leverage resets across key levels.​

item.title: Fed Rate Decision: As The D-Day Arrives, Here's A Look At Some Key Narratives So Far
item.description: According to data from the CME FedWatch tool, there is an 89.9% probability of a 25 basis point rate cut on Wednesday.
